Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: This will never be true — CT_DOCKAREA is for the dock area, not dock windows. The dock area will never generate an UnmapNotify event.

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: con_get_workspace(focused) will always return a non-NULL result.

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: Please add a debug message here: DLOG("UnmapNotify for window 0x%08x (container %p)\n", ((xcb_unmap_notify_event_t*)inside_event)->window, inside_con);

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: please change to “UnmapNotify for a managed window on the current workspace, aborting\n”
